<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Guiding Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=62) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 53 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Halfling Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=54)

</column>

---

Your luck guides you to look the right way and aim your blows unerringly. You can use [Halfling Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=54) twice per day: once in response to its normal trigger, and once when you fail a Perception check or attack roll instead of the normal trigger.
name: Guiding Luck
